body.p: offers an Oxygen AI Positron add-on that provides an advanced solution for using AI assistance to enhance the documentation content creation process. By leveraging the power of AI platforms, the AI Positron streamlines and enhances the writing experience by providing a variety of useful AI based actions and features, the possibility to chat and refine responses, and lots of customization possibilities for defining new custom AI actions and behaviors.

The add-on contributes an AI Positron side-view. To initiate the installation process for the add-on, select AI Positron from the Tools menu. Once installed, selecting the action opens the AI Positron view.
For information about the Oxygen AI Positron and its features, see the Oxygen AI Positron for Desktop user guideOxygen AI Positron for Eclipse user guide.
